quoteText:
• The IP addresses of visitors and logged-in users.
  • For logged-in users, the pseudonym or handle of your choosing
  • For logged-in users, your email address
  • Information you send to us (for example, if/when you email us, or if you purchase an item from our store)
    • We use account information to allow users to post definitions under the handle of their choosing.
    • We use contact information to contact our users about our website and services.
    • We use visitor IP addresses to analyze trends among our users and to help improve and secure our website.
    • We use identification information to help secure our website and enforce our terms of service
    We disclose account information as is reasonably necessary to authenticate your account, and other identifiers where needed to process a sale from our store.
title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
